fn.p: The pairwise Spearman correlations between the RRT values at position 6 are shown for five independent experiments, where the experiments are named YPD1, YPD2, SC-Lys, SC-His, and Ingolia. The SC-Lys and SC-His experiments were carried out by JG, and used flash-freezing as the initial method for stopping ribosome movement. The YPD1 and YPD2 experiments were carried out by YC (Cai and Futcher, 2013), and used addition of ice and cycloheximide to the culture as the initial method for stopping ribosome movement. The ‘Ingo’ experiment was that carried out by Ingolia et al. (2009). Further details are given in ‘Materials and methods’. Complete RRT values for each position in each experiment are provided in Supplementary file 1.
